iteration_history.summary: Tests timeout after 2700s, failing acceptance criteria. Root cause: old test files (test_app_integration.rs, smoke_test.rs) still exist and run alongside new integration.rs, causing 760+ lines of duplicate tests. Remove old files to eliminate duplication and allow test suite to complete.

Stuck loop detected: same timeout failure recurring across 3 iterations. Root cause identified (old test files test_app_integration.rs and smoke_test.rs still exist) but not resolved. File deletion did not complete successfully in iterations 1-2. Requires human intervention to verify and execute file cleanup.

Integration tests are well-structured with excellent coverage, but tests fail due to infinite loop bug in src/layout.rs:110-122. The BFS algorithm in LayoutEngine::assign_layers() re-queues already-processed nodes, causing ~40% of tests (12/30) to timeout indefinitely. Fix: Add visited set to prevent node re-processing in BFS. Other 18 tests that don't reach layout stage would pass. Once the layout.rs bug is fixed, all acceptance criteria will be met.
